full_text: 418029489 Block II.-Information About Alien Beneficiary 7. Name of alien VIDYA SAGAR PAHWA (First name) (Middle initial) (Last name) If this petition is for a married woman, give her maiden name NONE 8. Alien's marital status (Check appropriate block) Married Widowed Divorced Single a. Name of alien's spouse, if married, and date and country of birth HIRA DEVI PAHWA AUGUST 8, 1912, PAKISTAN b. Names, birthdates and countries of birth of alien's children, if any YASH PAL PAHWA, NOV 3, 1936, PAKISTAN 2 ASHOK KUMAR SEPT 17,1938 PAKISTAN 3 MANJU KHANNA JULY 5, 1943, INDIA PRAVEEN KUMAR PAHWA AUGUST 13,1946, PAKISTAN C. Full address of alien's spouse and children, if any SPOUSES ADDRESS 6, CONANT ST, WEST CONCORD Mass01781 CHILDRENS ADDRESS: 4/53 RUPNAGAR, DELHI-7, INDIA - FOR No 4. & FOR No No.1 6 CONANT ST WEST CONCORD HASS 01781 1.9 11. If this petition is for your spouse or child, give the following: 088 ZE ENOBIA DENVER COLORADO FO R NO 2 NONE 802191 a. Date and place of your present marriage 413/1 G BLOCK NEW ALIPORE CALEUTTA INDIA b. Number of your prior marriages C. Number of prior marriages of spouse FOR No 3 d. Last address at which you and your spouse resided together (Apt. No.) (Number and street) From To (Town or city) (State or Province) (Country) (Month) (Year) (Month) (Year) 12. If this petition is for a child, a. Is the child married? b. Is the child your adopted child? If so, give the names, dates, and places of birth of all other children adopted by you. If none, so state 13. If this petition is for a brother or sister, are both your parents the same as the alien's parents? If not, submit a separate statement giving full details as to parentage, dates of marriage of parents, and the number of previous marriages of each parent. 14. If separate petitions are also being submitted for other relatives, give names of each and relationship to petitioner HIRA DEVI PAHWA MOTHER 15. Have you ever filed a petition for this alien before? NO If so, give place and date of filing and result: NONE 16. Has this alien ever been in the United States? YES Has this alien ever been deported from the United States? NO If so, give Alien Registration Number, and date and place where deportation hearing was held: NONE 17. Address in the United States where alien will reside 6, CONANT STREET, WEST COWCORD, Mass 01781 18. a. Address at which alien is presently residing 6, CONANT STREET, WEST CONCORD, MASS01781 Since JUNE 9, 1968 (Apt. No.) (Number and street) (Town or city) (State) (ZIP Code, if in U.S.) (Month) (Year) b. If alien is in the United States, give the following: Name and address of present employer ANDERSON - NICHOLS & coinc 150 CAUSEWAY ST, BOSTON, MASS Date alien began this employment SEPT R 16 1968 (Month) (Day) (Year) 19. Check the appropriate box below and furnish the information required for the box checked: a. Alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in (City in foreign country) (Foreign country) b. Alien is in the United States and will apply for adjustment of status to that of a lawful permanent resident in the Office of the Immigration and Naturalization Service at BOSTON MASSA CHUSSETTS , (City) (State) If the application for adjustment of status is denied the alien will apply for a visa abroad at the American Consulate in NEW DELHI NDIA PASSPORT AND FOR (City in, foreign country) OF ALIEN is ALREADY IN your (Foreign OFFICE country)- FILE A18029489 Block III.-Oath or Affirmation of Petitioner I swear (affirm) that I know the contents of this petition signed by me and that the statements herein are true and correct. Signature of petitioner (See Instruction No. 5) Naghsal Paw Subscribed and sworn to (affirmed) before me this 2011 day of 1949 [SEAL] My commission expires MX COMMISSION EXPIRES (Signature Junning of officer A.D. oath) at (Title) MAY 15, 1975 administering Block IV. Signature of Person Preparing Form, if Other Than Petitioner I declare that this document was prepared by me at the request of the petitioner and is based on all information of which I have any knowledge.
